name: neshume
description:
Neshume means soul in yiddish. This short visual novel is about rituals, those that are passed on, but also those that are forgotten.

Use the arrows of your keyboard to move around. You can also click and drag to change the point of view but it is not necessary to play.

Made with bitsy3d by aloelazoe, a hack from the original bitsy editor by adam ledoux.
